s.text: Chavez said she called Colorado Legal Services because she felt sick and did not know where to turn.
The laws require that farm workers be prevented from entering fields treated with pesticides until recommended times have elapsed.

There was no central location where the required information was being posted, and several of them did not have decontamination supplies,' said Britta Campbell, an EPA enforcement officer who conducted most of the farm inspections.

There was no central location where the required information was being posted, and several of them did not have decontamination supplies,' said Britta Campbell, an EPA enforcement officer who conducted most of the farm inspections.
The company that hired the workers for the Olathe farm and the farmer whose land they were working have denied any role in making the workers sick.
The farm workers said they knew they had breathed poison moments after a crop-duster buzzed nearby, spraying a field of sweet corn with pesticides to kill mites and worms.

Yet dozens of chemicals commonly used to kill weeds, fungus and insects on agricultural crops can cause immediate sickness in people who inhale, swallow or absorb them through skin contact, Wuerthele said.
